text: Walter Francis "Buddy" Davis (January 5, 1931 â€“ November 17, 2020) was an American athlete. He won a gold medal in the high jump at the 1952 Summer Olympics. He later became a professional basketball player.Buddy Davis. sports-reference.com He played for the Philadelphia Warriors between 1953 to 1958 and for the St. Louis Hawks in 1958.Walt Davis . basketball-reference.com Davis was born in Beaumont, Texas. He studied at Texas A&M; University. Davis died on November 17, 2020 in Port Arthur, Texas at age 89. ==References== Category:1931 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Golden State Warriors players Category:Atlanta Hawks players Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Sportspeople from Texas Category:People from Beaumont, Texas Category:American high jumpers
title: Walt Davis
